attributes.additional_details:
Link to one article about their dangers and leading charity Lullaby trust stating to remove them  not use them

https://www.lullabytrust.org.uk/parents-should-remove-cot-bumpers/

A link to a babies death 

https://kidsindanger.org/family-voices/preston/

Another death 

https://kidsindanger.org/family-voices/aiden/

There is more sad deaths like thease . How many more have to die before lives will come before profit  !!

Little lives need us to fight to be the dead ones voices . We can do this
attributes.background:
Cot bumpers are killing innocent babies lives .  Sadly statistics do not reflect this as many are not even listed as cot bumper related deaths. 
No professionals recommend cot bumpers. In fact all say to never use them . They need to be made ILEGAL
